modName: Pontimus - Thane of Skyrim Hero of the People Daedric Champion
summary: Level 81 Nord Warrior with all vanilla quests completed (Except Paarthurnax and The Bonds of Matrimony)
descriptionHtml:
This is my amazing Nord warrior, specialized in two-handed swords and heavy armor. His gear is custom-made in legendary quality with the best enchantments. All quests are completed, all unique items and artifacts are collected and stored in his Markarth estate, along with a metric tonne of materials and ingredients for just about anything he wants to craft with his maxed out skills.

This awesome guy joined the Imperial Legion and won the civil war. He rose through the ranks and was promoted to Legate, cause he's just that awesome.

His greatest feat is his ability to kill everything, so naturally he was inducted into the Dark Brotherhood as their Listener.

The Thieves Guild didn't want to miss out on this Messiah, so they took him in and made him their leader as well.

He's probably the smartest dude in Tamriel, cause he was promoted to Arch-Mage of the college of Winterhold the same week he enrolled.

In case you don't get how amazing he is yet, let me tell you, the ghost of the Companion's former Harbinger returned to the world of the living to declare this tremendous gentleman his successor.

And of course, he was made Thane in ALL the Holds and given a house in each major city, pimped out with everything he needs, furniture, Housecarl, you name it!

If you should happen to find a quest that I might have missed, please leave a comment and tell me.

Also, enjoy!
author: Poper40
